description: Architected the frontend environment for the SoleSavy member's dashboard using NextJS, Redux, and Tailwind CSS, and integrated data from Sanity.io. I also led code quality initiatives with pre-commit hooks, built a reusable component library with StorybookJS, and set up Jenkins and Docker for automated deployments. Additionally, I worked on tool to automate new member onboarding in Slack, using NestJS and PostgreSQL.
